Service Details: Provides assessment, recommendations, brief follow-up in the community and/or referral to community supports
Eligibility: Individuals experiencing a mental health crisis and/or who may be at imminent risk to harm themselves or others
How to Apply: Referrals can be made from RCMP, community agencies, physicians, Kelowna General Hospital, MHSU programs, and family or friends by calling the Kelowna Health Centre at 250.868.7788 or by calling CRT at 250.212.8533
Address & Map: Kelowna Central Health Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5
